name: Champion's Chalice
description:
Champion’s Chalice is a single player Roguelike Auto Battler. Choose your champion, buy units and items, roll the shop, and battle enemy parties. Discover unique and powerful synergies as you traverse varied environments in search of prized treasure. Can you find the chalice?

Features:
  • Choose your champion: Start each run by choosing between two random champions. Each has a unique activated ability which provides distinct strategic and tactical advantages. They have limited uses, so it’s up to you to decide when is best!

  • Build unique parties: Recruit units from new areas as you progress throughout the run. Uncover their synergies and employ different build strategies on your search for treasure.


  • Putting it to the test: In between each shop phase, your party auto battles against progressively harder enemy parties from the area. You only progress if you win, so sometimes you have to get creative.


  • Items and artifacts: Play close attention to the consumable items and artifacts you find while rolling the shop. Their effects can greatly increase your party’s power through their synergies with various units and each other.

  • Test your luck: Encounter and play various minigames as you progress. You decide if the risk is worth the reward.


  • Dynamic progression: Each completed run spans five stages with each stage consisting of a random choice between two unique environments. This means almost every run gives you access to a unique subset of units and items in the pool. Use the rewards you earn from playing to unlock new items and units in the shop!

Includes:
  • 100+ unique units
  • 130+ consumable items and artifacts
  • 10 unique environments
  • 10 challenge modes
  • 5 champions
  • Achievements and statistics
